App Name: ToonArt

Brief: Transform your ordinary pictures and videos into stunning, animated works of art with ToonArt. Animate, cartoonize, and create custom emojis all in one place. With AI-enhanced editing tools, you can easily share your vibrant creations on popular social platforms.
